sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_GCC_SUMMARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_GCC_SUMMARY ( GCC_SUMMARY_ID,CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,TEAM_ID, DOCUMENT_NO,FORM_TYPE_DATASET,UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, SAME_NAME_IND,REPORT_INCLUDE_IND,IS_AUTO_SAVED,LOCK_ARRANGMENT_IND,RISK_SUMMARY,ENTERED_DATE,GCC_COMP_TYPE,GRID_UPDATED_ON )values ( #id#,#crn#,#subjectId#,#processCycleId#,#teamTypeId#, #rdNumber#,'W-C',sysdate,#updateBy#,#tableBottomNotes#, #identifiedSubject#,'Y','N','N',#summaryOfRisk#,#entered#,#gccType#,sysdate )

INSERT INTO RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP (GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_ID, RISK_CODE, GCC_SUMMARY_ID) SELECT RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #riskVO.code#,#gccWCVO.id# FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_ID FROM RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP WHERE GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #gccWCVO.id# AND RISK_CODE = #riskVO.code# )

SELECT RG_GCC_SUMMARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_GCC_SUMMARY ( GCC_SUMMARY_ID,CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,TEAM_ID,ENTERED_DATE, FORM_TYPE_DATASET,UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, SAME_NAME_IND,REPORT_INCLUDE_IND,IS_AUTO_SAVED,LOCK_ARRANGMENT_IND,PARENT_RECORD_ID,GCC_COMP_TYPE )values ( #autoSaveId#,#crn#,#subjectId#,#processCycleId#,#teamTypeId#,#entered#, 'W-C',sysdate,#updateBy#,#tableBottomNotes#, #identifiedSubject#,'Y','Y','N',#id#,#gccType# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RG_GCC_SUMMARY SET PROCESSCYCLEID = #processCycleId#, UPDATED_ON = sysdate, UPDATED_BY = #updateBy#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES = #tableBottomNotes#, SAME_NAME_IND = #identifiedSubject#, RISK_SUMMARY = #summaryOfRisk#, ENTERED_DATE = #entered#, IS_AUTO_SAVED = 'N', PARENT_RECORD_ID = null, DOCUMENT_NO = #rdNumber# WHERE GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #id#
UPDATE RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS SET SUBJECT_NAME = #subjectNameWc#, WC_UI = #worldCheckUi#, OFFICIAL_LIST_IND = #officialList#, ARTICLE_TEXT = #articleText# WHERE GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #id#

UPDATE RG_GCC_SUMMARY SET PROCESSCYCLEID = #processCycleId#, UPDATED_ON = sysdate, UPDATED_BY = #updateBy#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES = #tableBottomNotes#, SAME_NAME_IND = #identifiedSubject#, RISK_SUMMARY = #summaryOfRisk#, ENTERED_DATE = #entered#, IS_AUTO_SAVED = 'Y', PARENT_RECORD_ID = #id# WHERE GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #autoSaveId#
sqlMap.select: select case when count(*) > 0 then 'true' else 'false' END from RG_GCC_RISKS_TABLE where case_id = #crn# and processcycleid = #processCycleId# and GCC_COMP_TYPE=#componentType#

SELECT count(*) FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg ,CMS_CASECYCLE cc, RG_SUBJECT cs WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# and rg.PROCESSCYCLEID = cc.CASECYCLE_ID and rg.SUBJECT_ID = cs.SUBJECT_ID AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
rg.GCC_COMP_TYPE=#componentType#
rg.SUBJECT_ID=#subjectId#
rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#

select rgData.*, rgwcrk.RISK_CODE,rgwcrk.GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_ID, risk.RISK from ( SELECT rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID,rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED,rg.RISK_SUMMARY,rownum rn, rg.FORM_TYPE_DATASET,rg.CASE_ID,rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME,rg.PROCESSCYCLEID,cc.DESCRIPTION,cc.PROCESSCYCLE_ORDER, rg.UPDATED_ON, rg.UPDATED_BY, rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, rg.DOCUMENT_NO,rg.GCC_ID,rg.SAME_NAME_IND,cs.REPORT_ORDER,cs.is_primary_sub, rg.PRINT_ORDER,rg.LOCK_ARRANGMENT_IND,rg.REPORT_INCLUDE_IND, rg.TEAM_ID,rg.ENTERED_DATE,rg.GCC_COMP_TYPE, rgwcdtl.GCC_WCDOC_ID,rggocdtl.GOC_DOC_ID FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg JOIN CMS_CASECYCLE cc ON cc.CASECYCLE_ID = rg.PROCESSCYCLEID JOIN RG_SUBJECT cs ON cs.SUBJECT_ID = rg.SUBJECT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS rgwcdtl ON rgwcdtl.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_GOCDOC_DETAILS rggocdtl ON rggocdtl.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID
WHERE rg.CASE_ID =#crn# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
rg.SUBJECT_ID=#subjectId#
rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#
rg.GCC_COMP_TYPE=#componentType#
order by rg.REPORT_INCLUDE_IND desc,cs.is_primary_sub desc, cs.REPORT_ORDER asc, upper(cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME) asc, cc.PROCESSCYCLE_ORDER desc ,rg.DOCUMENT_NO asc
) rgData LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP rgwcrk ON rgwcrk.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rgData.GCC_SUMMARY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS rgwcdtl ON rgwcdtl.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rgData.GCC_SUMMARY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_RISK_MASTER risk ON risk.RISK_CODE = rgwcrk.RISK_CODE
WHERE rgData.rn BETWEEN #start# AND #limit#
order by rgData.REPORT_INCLUDE_IND desc,rgData.FORM_TYPE_DATASET desc,rgData.is_primary_sub desc, rgData.REPORT_ORDER asc, upper(rgData.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME) asc, rgData.SAME_NAME_IND ASC,rgData.PROCESSCYCLE_ORDER desc, rgData.DOCUMENT_NO, risk.RISK asc
SELECT gcc_reset_id, subject_id, processcycleid FROM rg_reset_gcc_rd_number where case_id = #crn#
sqlMap.delete: delete from rg_reset_gcc_rd_number where gcc_reset_id in($idList$)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID,rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED,rg.RISK_SUMMARY, rg.FORM_TYPE_DATASET,rg.CASE_ID,rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME,rg.PROCESSCYCLEID,cc.DESCRIPTION, to_date(to_char(rg.UPDATED_ON, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH:MI:SS AM'),'dd/mm/yyyy HH:MI:SS AM') UPDATED_ON,rg.UPDATED_BY,rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, rg.DOCUMENT_NO,rg.GCC_ID,rg.SAME_NAME_IND, rg.PRINT_ORDER,rg.LOCK_ARRANGMENT_IND,rg.REPORT_INCLUDE_IND, rg.TEAM_ID,rg.ENTERED_DATE, rg.GCC_COMP_TYPE, rgwcdtl.GCC_WCDOC_ID,rggocdtl.GOC_DOC_ID,rgwcrk.GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_ID, rgwcrk.RISK_CODE, risk1.RISK,rgwcdtl.subject_name SUBJECT_NAME_WC,rgwcdtl.WC_UI,rgwcdtl.ARTICLE_TEXT,rgwcdtl.OFFICIAL_LIST_IND FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg JOIN CMS_CASECYCLE cc ON cc.CASECYCLE_ID = rg.PROCESSCYCLEID JOIN RG_SUBJECT cs ON cs.SUBJECT_ID = rg.SUBJECT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP rgwcrk ON rgwcrk.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS rgwcdtl ON rgwcdtl.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_GOCDOC_DETAILS rggocdtl ON rggocdtl.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_RISK_MASTER risk1 ON risk1.RISK_CODE = rgwcrk.RISK_CODE
WHERE rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #id# order by rg.PRINT_ORDER ASC
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP WHERE GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #gccId# AND RISK_CODE NOT IN ($idList$)
sqlMap.select: select count(rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID) FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg WHERE rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete:
delete FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY WHERE GCC_SUMMARY_ID IN
#ids[]#
delete FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID IS NULL
delete FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID = #parentId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg, RG_GCC_SUMMARY prnt WHERE upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND rg.PARENT_RECORD_ID = #parentId# AND prnt.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rg.PARENT_RECORD_ID and prnt.PROCESSCYCLEID in ($processCycleId$)
SELECT rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID IS NULL

SELECT rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID, rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, rg.CASE_ID, rgccrisk.RISK_CODE, rg.DOCUMENT_NO, risk.RISK, rg.SAME_NAME_IND, rgccrisk.GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_ID FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg JOIN CMS_CASECYCLE cc ON cc.CASECYCLE_ID = rg.PROCESSCYCLEID JOIN RG_SUBJECT cs ON cs.SUBJECT_ID = rg.SUBJECT_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP rgccrisk ON rgccrisk.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_RISK_MASTER risk ON risk.RISK_CODE = rgccrisk.RISK_CODE WHERE rg.CASE_ID =#crn# AND rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') AND upper(rg.REPORT_INCLUDE_IND)=upper('Y')
rg.GCC_COMP_TYPE=#componentType#
order by rg.DOCUMENT_NO ASC, rg.SUBJECT_ID ASC

select distinct risk.risk_code, gcc.subject_id from rg_gcc_wcdoc_risk_map risk join rg_gcc_summary gcc on gcc.gcc_summary_id = risk.gcc_summary_id where gcc.case_id = #crn# and gcc.processcycleid = #processCycleId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_GCC_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_GCC_SUMMARY_HST ( HISTORY_ID,CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,SAME_NAME_IND, RISK_SUMMARY,REPORT_INCLUDE_IND,FORM_TYPE_DATASET,TEAM_ID,ENTERED_DATE,DOCUMENT_NO,GCC_SUMMARY_ID,GCC_COMP_TYPE ) SELECT #summaryHstId#,CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,sysdate,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,SAME_NAME_IND, RISK_SUMMARY,REPORT_INCLUDE_IND,FORM_TYPE_DATASET,TEAM_ID,ENTERED_DATE,DOCUMENT_NO,GCC_SUMMARY_ID,GCC_COMP_TYPE FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY WHERE GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #id#

insert into RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS_HST ( HISTORY_ID,SUBJECT_NAME,WC_UI,OFFICIAL_LIST_IND,ARTICLE_TEXT,GCC_WCDOC_ID,GCC_SUMMARY_ID,HISTORY_SUMMARY_ID ) SELECT RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS_HST_SEQ.NEXTVAL,SUBJECT_NAME,WC_UI,OFFICIAL_LIST_IND,ARTICLE_TEXT,GCC_WCDOC_ID,GCC_SUMMARY_ID,#summaryId# FROM RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS WHERE GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #id#
sqlMap.select: select ARTICLE_TEXT from RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS_HST where history_id=#recordId#
SELECT count(*) FROM RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS_HST rg where rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID=#recordId#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT wchst.HISTORY_ID, rg.UPDATED_ON, rg.UPDATED_BY, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, cc.DESCRIPTION,rg.ENTERED_DATE,rg.RISK_SUMMARY, rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, wchst.wc_ui, wchst.official_list_ind,wchst.SUBJECT_NAME FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY_HST rg,CMS_CASECYCLE cc, RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS_HST wchst WHERE rg.PROCESSCYCLEID = cc.CASECYCLE_ID and rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID=#recordId# and rg.history_id=wchst.history_summary_id order by rg.UPDATED_ON desc ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #limit#) WHERE rn >= #start#

SELECT GCC_SUMMARY_ID FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg, RG_SUBJECT cs WHERE rg.CASE_ID = #crn# AND rg.SUBJECT_ID=cs.subject_id AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') AND upper(rg.REPORT_INCLUDE_IND)!='N' AND rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#
rg.GCC_COMP_TYPE=#componentType#
order by rg.FORM_TYPE_DATASET desc,cs.is_primary_sub desc, cs.report_order, upper(cs.subject_name),same_name_ind asc, GCC_SUMMARY_ID asc

SELECT GCC_SUMMARY_ID FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg, RG_SUBJECT cs WHERE rg.CASE_ID = #crn# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') AND rg.SUBJECT_ID=cs.subject_id AND upper(rg.REPORT_INCLUDE_IND)!='N' AND rg.gcc_comp_type = #componentType# AND rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# order by rg.FORM_TYPE_DATASET desc,cs.is_primary_sub desc, cs.report_order, upper(cs.subject_name),same_name_ind asc, document_no asc
sqlMap.update:
update RG_GCC_SUMMARY set DOCUMENT_NO= case GCC_SUMMARY_ID
when #recList[].id# then #recList[].rdNumber#
END
GRID_UPDATED_ON = sysdate
where GCC_SUMMARY_ID IN
#recList[].id#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_GCC_SUMMARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_GCC_SUMMARY ( GCC_SUMMARY_ID,CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,DOCUMENT_NO, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,SAME_NAME_IND, RISK_SUMMARY,REPORT_INCLUDE_IND, IS_AUTO_SAVED,FORM_TYPE_DATASET,TEAM_ID,ENTERED_DATE,GCC_COMP_TYPE ) select #id#, CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,#processCycleId#,2147483647, sysdate,#userName#,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,SAME_NAME_IND, RISK_SUMMARY,'Y', IS_AUTO_SAVED,FORM_TYPE_DATASET,#teamId#,ENTERED_DATE,GCC_COMP_TYPE from RG_GCC_SUMMARY where GCC_SUMMARY_ID =#recordId#

SELECT RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS ( GCC_WCDOC_ID,SUBJECT_NAME,WC_UI,OFFICIAL_LIST_IND,ARTICLE_TEXT,GCC_SUMMARY_ID ) select #id#, SUBJECT_NAME,WC_UI,OFFICIAL_LIST_IND,ARTICLE_TEXT,#ids# from RG_GCC_WCDOC_DETAILS where GCC_SUMMARY_ID =#recordId#

INSERT INTO RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP (GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_ID, RISK_CODE, GCC_SUMMARY_ID) SELECT RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, RISK_CODE,#id# from RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP Where GCC_SUMMARY_ID=#recordId#
sqlMap.select:
select nvl(max(GRID_UPDATED_ON),sysdate) from RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg where rg.case_id=#crn#
rg.SUBJECT_ID=#subjectId#
rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#

SELECT rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID, rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, rg.CASE_ID, rgccrisk.RISK_CODE, rg.DOCUMENT_NO, risk.RISK, rg.SAME_NAME_IND, rgccrisk.GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP_ID FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg JOIN CMS_CASECYCLE cc ON cc.CASECYCLE_ID = rg.PROCESSCYCLEID JOIN RG_SUBJECT cs ON cs.SUBJECT_ID = rg.SUBJECT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_GCC_WCDOC_RISK_MAP rgccrisk ON rgccrisk.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_RISK_MASTER risk ON risk.RISK_CODE = rgccrisk.RISK_CODE WHERE rg.CASE_ID =#crn# AND rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') AND upper(rg.REPORT_INCLUDE_IND)=upper('Y') order by rg.DOCUMENT_NO ASC, rg.SUBJECT_ID ASC
sqlMap.insert:
insert into RG_GCC_SUMMARY_HST ( HISTORY_ID,CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,GCC_SUMMARY_ID ) SELECT RG_GCC_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.NEXTVAL,inner_view.* FROM
(SELECT CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,sysdate,#userName# UPDATED_BY ,#recList[]# GCC_SUMMARY_ID from RG_GCC_SUMMARY where GCC_SUMMARY_ID=#recList[]#)
inner_view

SELECT RG_GCC_RISKS_TABLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO RG_GCC_RISKS_TABLE (GCC_RISK_TABLE_ID,RISK_VALUE,UPDATED_BY,UPDATED_ON,CASE_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,SUBJECT_ID,GCC_COMP_TYPE) VALUES(#id#,#gccRiskTableVal#,#userName#,sysdate,#crn#,#processCycleId#,#riskSubjectId#,#gccType#)
sqlMap.delete: delete from RG_GCC_RISKS_TABLE where CASE_ID=#crn# and PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# and GCC_COMP_TYPE=#componentType#
sqlMap.select: select rgdir.risk_value RISKVAL,to_char(rgdir.UPDATED_ON, 'DD-MM-YY HH24:MI:SS') displayDate,cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME,rgdir.SUBJECT_ID, rgdir.UPDATED_BY from RG_GCC_RISKS_TABLE rgdir ,RG_SUBJECT cs where upper(rgdir.case_id)=upper(#crn#) and cs.SUBJECT_ID = rgdir.SUBJECT_ID and rgdir.processcycleid=#processCycleId# and rgdir.GCC_COMP_TYPE=#componentType# order by cs.is_primary_sub desc, cs.REPORT_ORDER asc,upper(cs.SUBJECT_NAME), cs.cms_subject_id
select count(*) from RG_GCC_RISKS_TABLE where upper(case_id)=upper(#crn#) and processcycleid=#processCycleId# and GCC_COMP_TYPE=#componentType#

select b.rownum1 from ( select a.*, rownum rownum1 from ( select rg.gcc_summary_id, rg.document_no, trim(rg.form_type_dataset) form_type_dataset, rg.same_name_ind, rg.subject_id, sub.report_order, sub.is_primary_sub, upper(sub.subject_name) subject_name from rg_gcc_summary rg join rg_subject sub on sub.subject_id = rg.subject_id where rg.case_id = #crn# and rg.processcycleid = #processCycleId# and rg.gcc_comp_type = #componentType# and rg.is_auto_saved = 'N' union all select -1 gcc_summary_id, 2147483647 document_no, #formType# form_type_dataset, #sameName# same_name_ind, sub.subject_id, sub.report_order, sub.is_primary_sub, upper(sub.subject_name) subject_name from dual join rg_subject sub on sub.subject_id = #subjectId# order by form_type_dataset desc, is_primary_sub desc, report_order, subject_name, subject_id, same_name_ind, document_no ) a ) b where b.gcc_summary_id = -1
SELECT rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID, rg.UPDATED_ON FROM RG_GCC_SUMMARY rg WHERE rg.GCC_SUMMARY_ID = #id#
